name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Python Engineer with over 10 years of experience in building high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance. Expertise in **Python**, **FastAPI**, and modern software architecture, with a proven track record of developing and deploying cloud-native applications on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**. Skilled in designing and implementing **REST APIs**, employing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration, and utilizing **PostgreSQL**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Redis** for reliable data handling and messaging. Demonstrated proficiency in building robust applications with **Asyncio** for asynchronous programming and leveraging observability tools such as **ELK**, **Loki**, **Prometheus**, and **Grafana** for monitoring and logging. Additionally experienced in microservices architecture, CI/CD automation, and ensuring compliance with industry standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about applying AI/ML capabilities to drive intelligent analytics and decision-making in production workflows.
